pkgmetadata.longdescription:
Noto Color Emoji 2.x is the rounder Oreo styled Emoji 12.0 ready set.
Noto Color Emoji 1.3x is the chubby Jelly Bean styled emoji which supported some Emoji 4.0 and skin tones.
Noto Color Emoji 1.2x is the skinny Jelly Bean styled emoji which supported some Emoji 4.0 with ZWJ used with multiple emojis to represent one emoji.
Noto Color Emoji 2.019_beta20200307_p20200721-r2 adds emojis for Unicode 13.0.
Noto Color Emoji 2.020 adds Unicode 13.1 support and new emojis.
Noto Color Emoji 2.034 adds Unicode 14.0 support and new emojis.
Noto Color Emoji 2.038 adds Unicode 15.0 support and new emojis.
This package is used to build the font from sources.
See files/noto-color-emoji-2.019_beta20200307_p20200721-revert-optipng-removal.patch on details about compression (optipng vs zopflipng).

use.flag: Color bitmap font in older format.
Build fonts as COLRv1 increasing scaling quality and decreasing storage size.
Special build that replaces unknown flags with a single placeholder unknown flag image and removal of region flags.
Produce a woff2 Brotli compressed font for distribution on HTTP web servers only. No systemwide support.
Compresses emoji images with optipng 6 times faster than upstream. (ebuild default, recommended for development or custom modding).

Compresses emoji images with zoptlipng. Better compression results at around ~3% (~373K savings, ~94 pages of memory savings) and deflate but ~6 times slower (or ~167 minutes longer) compared to optipng. (upstream default, recommeded for mobile or production)
